summary.para: Contains architecture-specific information to use to initialize an enclave when the enclave type is ENCLAVE_TYPE_VBS, which specifies a virtualization-based security (VBS) enclave.
The total length of the ENCLAVE_INIT_INFO_VBS structure, in bytes.
Upon entry to the function, specifies the number of threads to create in the enclave. Upon successful return from InitializeEnclave, contains the number of threads the function actually created.
